pageTitle: List of works by Johann Sebastian Bach - IMSLP/Petrucci Music Library: Free Public Domain Sheet Music
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {242=There are over 1000 known compositions by Johann Sebastian Bach, which are listed here in the order of their numbers in the most recent BWV catalogue, including the spurious works in the BWV Anhang ("Appendix").}
textBeforeTable: Cantatas (1–224) Works for Voice 10 Collections 9 Fragmentary, Lost, Doubtful, and Spurious Works 8 More Recent BWV Additions (1081–1128) 7 Late Contrapuntal Works (1079–1080) 6 Canons (1072–1078) 5.2 Overtures and Suites (1066–1070) 5.1 Concertos (1041–1065) 5 For Orchestra 4.2 For Two or More Instruments (1014–1040) 4.1 For Solo Instruments (995–1013) 4 Chamber Works 3.14 Variations and Miscellaneous Pieces (988–994) 3.13 Concertos (971–987) 3.12 Sonatas and sonata movements (963–970) 3.11 Fugues and Fughettas (944–962) 3.10 Preludes (921–943) 3.9 Preludes, Fugues, Fantasias, Toccatas (846–962) 3.8 Overtures and Suites (831–845) 3.7 Partitas for keyboard (825–830) 3.6 Miscellaneous suites (818–824) 3.5 French Suites (812–817) 3.4 English Suites (806–811) 3.3 Four Duettos from Clavier-Übung III (802-805)
